comment._content: My husband works in an herbarium. It is located in a basement area. He would kill for some natural light!

comment.author: 32998163@N00
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Systematic Botany (not for "pretty flower images"), and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment._content: @fiberarts: natural light via windows is generally not a good idea for an herbarium...
